performance_metrics.name: Bread Volume (per Batch)
performance_metrics.description: Total volume of bread produced per batch, accounting for various bread types (loaf, rolls, etc.).

performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate (kg/hour)
performance_metrics.description: The amount of bread produced per hour, taking into account downtime and maintenance.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (per Loaf - 800g)
performance_metrics.description: Internal volume of the bread loaf, a key indicator of texture and quality.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (Finished Product)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water in the finished bread product; impacts shelf life and texture.

performance_metrics.name: Cell Count (per gram)
performance_metrics.description: Number of gas bubbles (cells) per unit of bread, affecting texture and volume.

performance_metrics.name: First-Pass Yield
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of batches that meet quality standards on the first attempt – minimizing rework.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Capacity for mixing large batches of dough; agitator type: Planetary for optimal dough development.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Precise temperature control for optimal yeast activity during the first proofing stage.

implementation_requirements.name: Retarding Cabinet Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled temperature for slowing yeast activity during the final proofing.

implementation_requirements.name: Steam Injection System
implementation_requirements.description: For creating steam during baking to generate a crust and improve volume.

implementation_requirements.name: Oven Temperature Profile
implementation_requirements.specification: Stage 1: 250°C (3 minutes), Stage 2: 230°C (10 minutes), Stage 3: 210°C (5 minutes)
implementation_requirements.description: Customizable temperature profile to achieve desired crust color and crumb structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Belt Conveyor Length
implementation_requirements.description: Transporting baked bread efficiently and consistently.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling System Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Rapid cooling to prevent over-proofing and maintain quality.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
BRC Food Safety Standards (British Retail Consortium)
EU Regulations (2015/2283 - Food Information to Consumers)
operational_considerations: Raw Material Storage (Wheat Flour, Yeast, Water): Temperature and humidity control are crucial.
Hygiene and Sanitation: Strict adherence to food safety regulations is essential.
Preventive Maintenance: Regular maintenance of equipment to minimize downtime.
Energy Efficiency: Optimization of energy consumption for cost reduction.
Batch Tracking and Traceability: Implementing a system for tracking each batch of bread from raw materials to finished product.
Staff Training: Proper training of personnel on baking techniques, equipment operation, and food safety protocols.
